original_text: They shall not shave their heads or let their locks grow long; they shall surely trim the hair of their heads.
korean_text: 그들은 또 머리털을 밀지도 말며 머리털을 길게 자라게도 말고 그 머리털을 깎기만 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: They shall not shave their heads
or let their locks grow long
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 머리털을 길게 자라게 두지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: they shall surely trim the hair of their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 반드시 머리카락을 잘라야 할 것이다
